original_text: “Let there be a covenant between me and you, as there was between my father and your father. Behold, I am sending to you a present of silver and gold. Go, break your covenant with Baasha king of Israel, that he may withdraw from me.”
korean_text: 나와 당신 사이에 약조가 있고 내 아버지와 당신의 아버지 사이에도 있었느니라 내가 당신에게 은금 예물을 보냈으니 와서 이스라엘의 왕 바아사와 세운 약조를 깨뜨려서 그가 나를 떠나게 하라 하매

sentences.original_text: Let there be a covenant between me and you
as there was between my father and your father
sentences.korean_translation: 내 아버지와 당신 아버지 사이에 있었던 것처럼

sentences.original_text: I am sending to you a present of silver and gold
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신에게 은과 금 선물을 보내고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: break your covenant with Baasha king of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 왕 바아사와 맺은 당신의 언약을 깨고

sentences.original_text: that he may withdraw from me
